Questions

  1. Are any teams other than those below currently using the tool?
  2. Do OneDrive and OExt use it? If not, why?

Description

Open Documentation System (ODS previously known as Apex Documentation System or Open Authoring) is a modern and collaborative process for UE, Dev, Test, PM, and the community to easily contribute to developer content.

Owners/Contacts

Teams Using

O365 uses it for APIs, How to articles & Interactive Customer Experience

VSO uses it for APIs & Get Started
